title: Miss notification LEDs? This new variant of the Honor 60 Pro has a unique solution
content:
In December last year, Honor unveiled two new mid-range smartphones â€” the Honor 60 and Honor 60 Pro. Three months later, the company has now introduced a new variant of the Honor 60 Pro called Honor Code. It’s essentially the same phone hardware-wise but features a brand new design with an electrochromic glass back. The

The post Miss notification LEDs? This new variant of the Honor 60 Pro has a unique solution appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Honor 60 Pro "Honor Code" stands out from the crowd with its unique design. The phone's back incorporates electrochromic glass. Read on.
